content.question: The acceleration due to gravity on the surface of Planet <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="lowercase g sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></math>. The acceleration due to gravity on the surface of Earth is <math alttext="lowercase g sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>E</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression?

choices.label: <math alttext="lowercase g sub X equals one eighth lowercase g sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>E</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="lowercase g sub x equals one fourth lowercase g sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>E</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="lowercase g sub X equals one half lowercase g sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>E</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="lowercase g sub X equals lowercase g sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>E</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="lowercase g sub X equals 2 lowercase g sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>E</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="lowercase g sub X equals one eighth lowercase g sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>E</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
